docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text: How to complete a Checklist Enrollment Requirements Logged In One of the following: Imported Checklist Created Enrollment Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Enrollments" to access your team's enrollments. To access the "Enrollment for Pastor" enrollment, click on its name. To complete the enrollment items, click on "Enrollment Items. Fill the respective fields with the necessary data Enter date and then click "Next" Check the checkbox and then click "Next" Enter name of program and then click "Next"
docs.title: How to complete a Checklist Enrollment
How to complete a Checklist Enrollment

docs.text: Once successfully logged in, click on "Enrollments" to access your team's enrollments. To access the "Enrollment for Pastor" enrollment, click on its name. To complete the enrollment items, click on "Enrollment Items. Fill the respective fields with the necessary data Enter date and then click "Next" Check the checkbox and then click "Next" Enter name of program and then click "Next"
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: How to create an enrollment for an existing checklist Requirements Logged In One of the following: Imported Checklist Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Checklists" to access your team's checklists. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To create an enrollment click on "Create Enrollment". To enroll yourself, you must first fill out the "Detail" form, only the Enrollment Name is required. Click "Save" to complete enrollment. To see the newly created enrollment, click on "Enrollments". {.center .small}
docs.title: How to create an enrollment for an existing checklist
How to create an enrollment for an existing checklist

docs.text: Once successfully logged in, click on "Checklists" to access your team's checklists. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To create an enrollment click on "Create Enrollment". To enroll yourself, you must first fill out the "Detail" form, only the Enrollment Name is required. Click "Save" to complete enrollment. To see the newly created enrollment, click on "Enrollments". {.center .small}
docs.title: Steps

docs.text: How to import a Community Checklist Requirements Logged In Steps Once successfully logged in, click on "Community" to access the community checklists. To access the "Sabbatical Application" checklist, click on its name. To import the checklist, click on it "Import Checklist" Confirm importing the checklist by clicking on "Import" Once successfully imported, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: How to import a Community Checklist
How to import a Community Checklist

docs.title: Steps

docs.text: How to log into Community Checklist Requirements Steps Go to https://communitychecklist.org/login to access the login screen Enter your user credentials and click on "Log In". You may click on "Remember Me" to save your credentials. Once successfully logged in, you will see the following screen.
docs.title: How to log into Community Checklist
How to log into Community Checklist
